extendedInfo.description: KIDZ PAINT LITE-coloring tool for kidz Age group of 2-6 yearsInspire your child with Kidz paint lite. Bring out the little artist in your child with Kidz paint litePainting app while exercising fine motor skills and allowing children to be creative and develop hand-eye coordination all at the same time. Save your child's creation to your device or share with friends.Through its collection of coloring pages, promotes the development of imagination, the arts, enhances concentration and learning abilities of children,=>	Best way to learn paint for kidz=>	Select your picture and fill your desire color=>	25+ cute images to coloring=>	save your picture=>	Share your picture on Facebook, Twitter =>	Send an email your picture to your friends =>	your kidz will love this appThe drawings are simple enough for young children to explore drawing and colors, to go beyond realism and to expand the limits of their imagination. The voice prompt invitations give kids autonomy over the app. Each illustration presents an opportunity to enhance both skills and imagination. And, of course, to have fun with art making.Paintings are a very exciting and interesting way to develop your child. Children learning to draw learn the basic colors and will be able to color the pictures while creating a bright and beautiful picture. Kids coloring pages teach perseverance, accuracy, and develop fine motor skills and attention of the child. Having decorated a favorite hero, one can save the result, and eventually the child will get a colorful.

reviews.title: BEST PAINT APP FOR KIDZ
reviews.comment: VERY NICE APP. CONGRATULATION TO THE DEVELOPER. VERY NICE AND SIMPLE APP WHERE NO MUCH COMPLICATION TO OPERATE .THIS SUMMER MY KIDZ WILL HAVE LOT OF FUN BY USING THIS APP.  NICE ABOUT THIS APP :  1 -ALL BEAUTIFUL PICTURES 2- VIBRANT COLORS 3- WE CAN SAVE THE IMAGE ON PHONE 4- SHARE ON FACEBOOK & TWITTER  5- WE CAN MAIL ALSO  ******************I LOVE THIS APP*************************
reviews.author: Sudhir Parmar

reviews.title: Nice One
reviews.comment: Perfect..!  Its not an Harmfull Apps - but we convince to our Kiddz with critical situation for using this apps and we hope kidzz will enjoy this Apps...and also we ALL..!  Thanks All - Who such a Massive work..!

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: Cheers Kids. Now you have the wall which you can use to fulfill your born passion of painting..Peaceful breath now parents can take as their kids wont spoil the walls of their home.  Kids Paint Lite : As the name suggests, Lite yet Powerful product by DRC Systems..Its very easy to fill up the colours in pencil scatches,Good Set of colors..Just to summerize,Painting goes cakewalk here.Go for it .Thanks DRC
